name: Bone Conduction Headphones, Wireless Bluetooth Open-Ear Sports Headphones with Mic, Type-C Quick Charging Long Battery Life, Upgrade Waterproof Earphones for Running, Walking, Cycling, Workout, Gift
short_description: Comfortable Fit - The lightweight titanium frame enables you to wear it for a long time without getting tired, and it remains stable during high-intensity training. It is firm and has good toughness, and can be bent freely.These running headphones are not only comfortable but also flexible and durable.

Excellent Sound Quality - Through advanced bone conduction technology, it allows you to feel the excellent audio transmitted through the bones. The clear sound and strong volume give you the best listening experience. The bone conduction headphones with a built-in microphone are suitable for remote video conferences.

Long Battery Life & Fast Charge - You can enjoy up to 10 hours of music or calls. The wireless headphones supports safe and stable Type-C fast charging.Save time and hassle with SOPOET open ear headphones.

Safety & Connection - Headphones bone conduction ensures that you can know the surrounding environment when enjoying your favorite audio. Compared with traditional earplugs or earmuff headphones, the safety is enhanced. Bluetooth 5.3 can achieve fast connection and stable seamless music playback.

Waterproof Function - With an IP55 waterproof rating, the nano - coating makes it resistant to sweat and rain. Whether you are running, cycling, hiking, or engaged in other high - intensity training or even extreme sports, it can perfectly adapt. Its durability and comfort are perfectly synchronized with your exercise rhythm.

name: PSIER Bone Conduction Headphones, Open Ear Bluetooth 5.4 Headphones, Bone Conduction Earbuds 10H Playtimes Sports Earphones with Mic, IPX6 Waterproof Earbuds for Hiking, Cycling, Gym, Black
short_description: [Open-Ear Comfort] PSIER Bone Conduction Headphones leverage new bone conduction technology to transmit rich, clear sound through your bones, offering superior audio clarity. The open-ear design lets you immerse in music while remaining fully aware of your environment.

[Lightweight & Secure Fit] Bone conduction earbuds are crafted with a flexible titanium memory frame that returns to shape for a secure fit, offering stability throughout your workout. Weighing just 26 grams and equipped with soft, skin-friendly silicone pads, the running headphones deliver lasting comfort without causing ear fatigue, even during extended wear.

[Stay Active in Any Weather] With up to 10 hours of music, calls, and podcasts on a single charge, these bluetooth headphones keep you going through your day. Featuring an IPX6 waterproof rating, they’re resistant to sweat and moisture, making them perfect for cycling and hiking. (Note: Not designed for swimming.)

[Bluetooth 5.4 & Easy to Use] The X11 bluetooth earbuds are equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology, offering a quick and stable connection for seamless audio streaming with reduced latency. Enjoy perfectly synced music with every move. The intuitive button controls make operation simple and efficient, while preventing accidental touches.

[Safe Enjoyment of Music] Open ear headphones are designed with safety in mind, letting you enjoy your favorite tunes while staying aware of your surroundings—unlike traditional headphones. Perfect for outdoor activities like hiking or cycling, they keep you motivated and connected without sacrificing awareness of your environment.

name: SHOKZ New OpenRun Pro 2 - Open-Ear, Bone Conduction Sport Headphones - with Reflective Strip - Sweat Resistant, Workout Headphones - Secure, Wireless, Comfortable Fit-Deep Bass and Smart Mic App
short_description: Unparalleled Audio - Dual drivers combine the clear highs of Bone Conduction Tech with the deep bass of Air Conduction Tech for 12 hours of powerful, 3D audio.

Open-Ear Awareness - SHOKZ's signature open-ear design helps you power through your workouts while keeping you safely aware of your surroundings. Leak-free listening ensures your audio remains for your ears only

Secure and Stable Fit - The weight-optimized design of this unibody frame with ergonomic ear hooks integrates a Ni-Ti alloy memory wire to provide a secure, comfortable fit that defies slips and shifts

Dedicated EQ Modes - Customize your audio experience with our dedicated EQ modes on the Shokz App. Enjoy pure bone conduction sound with the newly launched Classic Mode, or boost your audio in noisy environments with Volume Boost Mode.

Crystal-Clear Calls - Strategically positioned dual wind-resistant microphones and an AI noise reduction algorithm filter out 96.5% of background noise, including wind at speeds of up to 15 miles per hour.

name: SHOKZ New OpenFit 2 Open-Ear Headphones, True Wireless Bluetooth Earphones with Microphone, Earhook Earbuds with 48 Hours of Playtime, Fast Charging, IP55 Water-Resistant, with Carrying Bag, Black
short_description: Groundbreaking Audio Experience - The Shokz DualBoost composite drivers and OpenBass 2.0 algorithm pair crystal-clear mids and highs with a deeper, richer bass for an exceptionally detailed sound

Comfortable All-Day Wear - These featherlight, 9.4 g earhooks integrate a Ni-Ti alloy that contours to your ears for a personalized fit. IP55-rated water resistance ensures performance in any conditions

Open-Ear Awareness - Stay connected to your surroundings with Shokz open-ear design, and to your phone calls with dual noise cancelling mics. Keep your sound private with custom DirectPitch 2.0 technology
Longer Battery Life - Enjoy up to 11 hours on a single charge, 48 hours with the charging case, and a quick 10-minute charge for the extra 2 hours of listening to move you through your workout

Multifunction Buttons - Adjust volume, skip tracks, take calls, and switch between 2 paired devices with a press of the physical buttons. Customize these controls, your EQ modes, and more with the Shokz App

name: CXK Bone Conduction Headphones Bluetooth 5.4 Open Ear Headphones with Mic, Premium Loud Sound 10Hrs Playtime Bluetooth Headphones, IPX6 Waterproof Sports Headset for Running, Cycling, Walking
short_description: [Open-Ear Design] Bone conduction headphones, powered by the next-generation bone conduction technology enclosed cavity, deliver premium audio through the cheekbones, providing clear loud sound reproduction even in noisy environments. The open ear headphones allow you to enjoy music without missing the sound of your surroundings, comfortable listening while doing outdoor workouts.

[Bluetooth 5.4 Seamless Pairing] CXK bone conduction earbuds come with the latest version of Bluetooth 5.4 to provide a faster more stable connection. Bone Headphones one-step quickly pairing that Long presses the "MFB" button for 2 seconds to power on. First time use, click "X14" on your mobile device to connect, and effortlessly control your music and calls with easy one-key control.

[Stereo Sound Quality] Bone conduction headphones bluetooth feature large 15mm speaker drivers for premium high-quality stereo sound and immersive. It is suitable for all music genres with soft audio, allowing you to enjoy an immersive listening experience. Conduction headphones built-in microphone with wireless bluetooth connectivity provides you with wireless listening and a clear calling experience.
[10Hrs Playtime] Bluetooth headphones provide uninterrupted playback for up to 10 hours on a single charge. The headphones can be fully charged in 2 hours via Type C on standby for up to 240 hours.

[Lightweight & Comfortable] The wireless headphones are engineered with a wrap-around titanium frame, with a feather-light and ABS housing, a weight of just 28g, a length of 5.12 in, a width of 4.13 in, and the skin-friendly silicone material is used for the part in contact with the skin which is lightweight and stable, experience optimal comfort during extended use of the bone conducting headphones and ensure durability and reliability during workouts and outdoor. IP67 Waterproof Rated - Completely sweat and waterproof for workouts, fitness and running. Moisture detection alert included for safe charging. (Not suitable for swimming.)

8 Hours of Music & Calls - Enjoy eight continuous hours of music, calls and podcasts with our Bluetooth headphones. OpenRun also features a 10-minute quick charge for up to 1.5 hours of battery life. (Quick Charge Version of Aftershokz Aeropex
Outstanding Sound Quality - Bone conduction technology uses vibrations to transmit sound through your cheekbone directly to your inner ear for a premium audio experience.

name: CXK Open Ear Headphones, Bluetooth 5.4 True Wireless Earbuds with 60Hrs HD Stereo Sound, 0.27oz Lightweight Design Bone Conduction Headphones with Mic, IPX6 Waterproof Fit Workout, Running, Black
short_description: OPEN-EAR COMFORT - The ear hooks of the CXK bone conduction earbuds are made of skin-friendly silicone material. The entire headphones weigh only 0.27 ounces, and you can wear them for a long time without feeling any pressure. This ergonomic design ensures a secure and comfortable fit, allowing you to say goodbye to ear fatigue and enjoy a comfortable listening experience throughout the day

EXCEPTIONAL ANTI-SOUND-LEAKAGE TECHNOLOGY - The CXK bone conduction bluetooth headphones adopt the latest directional sound transmission technology, which accurately and efficiently delivers sound to the ears. This technology can reduce sound leakage by 97% and prevent any embarrassing sound leakage. Whether you are in a public place such as a library or a coffee shop, you can enjoy music without disturbing others

POWERFUL STEREO SOUND & CLEAR CALLS - These wireless headphones feature a 13mm precision Hi-Fi driver and the"Bass Master" technology designed by CXK, providing rich and immersive sound quality that enables you to distinguish the subtleties in music. The excellent restoration of musical instruments and vocals, along with precise voice capture, ensures clear communication. The CXK Bluetooth earbuds allow you to enjoy smooth calls, making the conversation as natural and fluent as a face-to-face chat

60 Hrs PLAYTIME & MULTIFUNCTIONAL BUTTONS - Say goodbye to frequent charging. The CT13 bone conduction headphones offer an impressive 60 hrs playtime, and each earbud can be used continuously for up to 12 hours. In addition, the external LED display allows you to know the remaining power of the charging case in real time, so you will never be without music on the go. With convenient physical buttons, you can adjust the volume, skip tracks, answer calls, and more just by pressing the buttons

BLUETOOTH 5.4 AND IPX6 WATERPROOF - The CXK air conduction headphones are equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology, providing faster transmission speed and a stable connection up to 33 feet. After the first connection, just take out the earphones, and they will automatically connect to your device. It also has IPX6 sweat-proof and waterproof function, allowing you to enjoy music without worry whether you are running, lifting weights, jogging, cycling, or hiking

name: Open Ear Headphones, Bluetooth 5.4 True Wireless Earbuds Bone Conduction Headphones with Mic Clear Calls, Comfort Fit Lightweight Bone Ear Buds with Hooks, 56H Playtime, IPX6 for Sport, Black
short_description: 【Open and Comfortable Design】The Haowolf Bone Conduction Bluetooth Headphones are made of skin-friendly silicone material and weigh only 14 grams. You can wear them for a long time without feeling discomfort. This ergonomic design ensures a secure and comfortable fit, allowing you to bid farewell to ear fatigue and enjoy a comfortable listening experience throughout the day

【Powerful Stereo Sound & Clear Calls】 The SP10 feature a 14.2-millimeter precision Hi-Fi driver and the Bass Boost technology designed by Haowolf, providing rich and immersive sound quality, enabling you to distinguish the nuances in music. Enjoy excellent reproduction of instruments and vocals, and ensure clear communication through accurate voice capture. The Haowolf Bluetooth earphones enable unobstructed conversations, just like having a face-to-face chat

【Advanced Anti-Sound Leakage Technology】The Haowolf Bluetooth headphones adopt the latest directional sound transmission technology, which accurately and efficiently transmits sound to the ears. This technology can reduce sound leakage by 97% and prevent any embarrassing sound leakage. When you need to relax alone or concentrate on your work, you can enjoy music without disturbing your family

【56 Hours of Playtime & IPX6 Waterproof】Bid farewell to the worry about how long the power will last. The SP10 bone conduction earbuds offer an impressive 56 hours of playtime, with each earbud capable of continuous use for up to 14 hours. In addition, the built-in LED display allows you to keep track of the remaining power of the charging case in real-time, so you'll never be without music while on the go. It also has an IPX6 sweat and water resistance rating, allowing you to enjoy music worry-free whether you're running, lifting weights, jogging, cycling, or hiking

【Bluetooth 5.4 & Smart Touch Control】The Haowolf open-ear earbuds are equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology, providing faster transmission speeds and a stable connection up to 33 feet. After the first connection, simply take out the earphones, and they will automatically connect to your device. Once worn, you can easily control your music and answer calls by using your fingers to touch the SP10, which brings great safety and convenience when you're driving, exercising, or running
